nodes.text: The Smoking Forest was a region of the volcanic planet Mustafar. Its name was derived from the smoke that would billow out of the tree-like rock chimneys present in the area. It would also be an area claimed by the Blackguard due to its position close to their headquarters, the Southern Jedi Ruins.

The Smoking Forest appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
